abstract: Florida House panel approves redistricting plan over objections that it will negatively affect black voters; Democratic Rep Corrine Brown is suing Legislature, citing disenfranchisement of black voters; plan will also move district held by Brown.
lead_paragraph: A House panel approved changes to Florida’s 27 congressional districts, despite criticism that the move would disenfranchise black voters.

headline.main: Florida: Disputed Plan for Voting Map Advances
headline.print_headline: Florida: Disputed Plan for Voting Map Advances

snippet: A House panel approved changes to Florida’s 27 congressional districts, despite criticism that the move would disenfranchise black voters.
